mapper.select: SELECT a.id,a.student_id,a.begin_time,a.end_time,a.number,a.reason,a.phone,a.status,a.file_path,a.code FROM information a,class b WHERE b.teacher_id = #{id} AND LEFT(a.student_id,10) = b.id AND a.is_agree = 'no' ORDER BY a.begin_time DESC
